metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to establish a mini civic centre at Chilonga in Mpika District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.
(a) how many local courts were in Kalabo District, as of December, 2023;
(d) why the local courts at (c) were not operational; and
(e) when the local courts at (c) will be operational.
(a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Mulobezi Railway Line, which is in a deplorable state;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Green Economy and Environment what measures the Government is taking to enhance research on climate change mitigation in the country.
Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) how many professional golfers the country produced from 2016 to 2021;
(b) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate golf infrastructure, countrywide;
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(d) what measures are being taken to improve the sport in the country.
